projects.title: POS System
projects.detail: The POS System was developed as a full-stack application to provide solutions for small businesses. It enables users to manage order processing, stock products, create invoices, record sales, print receipts, and ensure login security.

projects.title: Thread clone
projects.detail: Thread Clone was built for practicing both front-end with reactJs and back-end with ExpressJs and MySQL. The functionality of this project features like includes Login and Sign-Up security, implementation on creating and editing posts, and also checking posted history.

projects.title: CML-Shop
projects.detail: The purpose of building the CML-Shop project was to learn and solve problems encountered when I started learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as learning to use Bootstrap for responsive website applications.

projects.title: Quiz-App
projects.detail: Quiz-App is a website application that allows users to answer the questions. In each qestion users have 15 seconds to answer. If they answer correctly, they earn 1 point.

projects.title: Ting-Lok Clone
projects.detail: Ting-Lok Clone built for practicing with responsive website application using Boostrap framework of CSS.

education.name: Koh Sdach High School
education.detail: I have completed my grade 12 at Koh Sdach high school. My achievement includes received a Grade B on the Nation Exam, 2nd place in the Mathematic Genius Student Award and selected as a Class Monitor for grade 10, 11 and 12.

education.name: Royal University Of Phnom Penh
education.detail: I am currently a sophomore student in the Bachelor's degree program of Information Technology Engineering at the Royal University of Phnom Penh. I have completed 2 semesters and have a Cumulative GPA of 3.5. I have taken courses in Data Structures and Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Mathematics (Algebra for Computer Science), Basic and Advanced Programming Languages, and Project Practicum.

education.name: Australian Centre For Education (ACE)
education.detail: Currently, my General English program is GEP-6, which focuses on reading, listening, writing and speaking skills.
